--- layout: default title: Blue Ridge Brawl description: 'The Blue Ridge Brawl is an Offseason FIRST Robotics Competition event hosted by FRC teams 5724 and 5950 at Salem High School, Salem, VA.' ---

Blue Ridge Brawl

What is Blue Ridge Brawl?
Blue Ridge Brawl is an Off-season FIRST Robotics Competition event hosted by FRC teams 5724 Spartan Robotics and 5950 the Trojans. We will be playing FIRST Destination Deep Space in October 2019.

When: Friday, October 4, and Saturday, October 5, 2019.
Where: Salem High School, 400 Spartan Drive, Salem, VA 24153
Please see directions and parking for directions to the venue and load-in and parking instructions.
Fee: $300 Per Robot
Registration: The registration form is now available here!

Please consider registering to volunteer at the event here.

Feel free to Contact Us if you have any questions.

Registered Team List

The event will be free and open to the public (registration fee for teams).
The flyer can be found here. The event schedule is available here.

The event will be livestreamed on October 5 on First Updates Now's twitch channel.


The Game

Teams attending the 2019 Blue Ridge Brawl will be playing the 2019 FIRST Robotics Competition Game Destination: Deep Space.

Thank You to Our Event Sponsor

Mid-Atlantic Broadband Communities Corporation
